title: Epic: 12-Factor AgentOps v2.0 - ai-platform Learnings Integration
close_reason: Epic kickoff complete - all child issues created and ready for implementation

comments.author: fullerbt
comments.text:
Research: .agents/research/2025-12-27-agent-evolution-ai-platform-analysis.md
Plan: .agents/plans/2025-12-27-12-factor-v2-evolution-plan.md

Integrate ai-platform, Houston, and Fractal learnings into 12-Factor AgentOps:
- Add Implementation Patterns sections to factors III, VI, VII, VIII, XI, XII
- Create 'From Theory to Production' bridge document
- Document Houston/Fractal pattern heritage
- Add IC deployment profiles to Factor XII
- Sync to showcase site (12factoragentops.com)
- Release v2.0

title: Add IC Deployment Profiles to Factor XII (Package Patterns)
description: Add 3-tier IC model: Tier 1 Disconnected Edge, Tier 2 Internal Datacenter, Tier 3 Connected. Include air-gap deployment checklist, classification boundary patterns. Sanitize specifics.
close_reason: Added Implementation Patterns: 3-Tier IC Deployment, Air-Gap Playbook, Classification Boundaries, Multi-Tenancy, 86-Template Helm Chart

title: Add Implementation Patterns to Factor III (Focused Agents)
description: Add patterns from ai-platform: Event-Driven Activation (webhook/API/chat/cron taxonomy), Webhook-First Orchestrator-Last, KAgent CRD example (sanitized), Agent decision tree. Include anti-patterns.
close_reason: Completed: Added Implementation Patterns section (280 lines) covering Event-Driven Activation, Webhook-First architecture, Agent Decision Tree, KAgent CRD examples, and production Anti-Patterns. All validated from ai-platform deployment.

comments.author: fullerbt
comments.text:
Added Implementation Patterns section to Factor III (280 new lines):
- Pattern 1: Event-Driven Activation (webhook/API/chat/cron taxonomy with examples)
- Pattern 2: Webhook-First, Orchestrator-Last (direct event delivery vs orchestration)
- Pattern 3: Agent Decision Tree (when to use which trigger type)
- Pattern 4: KAgent CRD Definition (Kubernetes-native agent example with YAML)
- Pattern 5: Anti-Patterns (God Agent, Orchestrator-First, Stateful Agent with fixes)

All patterns include production validation from ai-platform deployment.

title: Add Implementation Patterns to Factor VII (Smart Routing)
description: Add coordination patterns: Composable Not Chainable, Blackboard coordination (Fractal), Shard/ShardRun model (intent != execution), N+1 worker pattern (Houston). Include anti-pattern: hard-coded chains.
close_reason: Added Implementation Patterns: Composable/Blackboard, SharedInformer, Classification-Aware Routing, Multi-Tier Model Routing

title: Add Implementation Patterns to Factor XI (Fail-Safe Checks)
description: Add self-healing patterns: Reconciliation loops (level-triggered > edge-triggered), Fail-closed defaults, Self-healing architecture, ToolCall audit trail (every action is a CRD). Include Fractal patterns.
close_reason: Added Implementation Patterns: Reconciliation Loops, Fail-Closed Defaults, Circuit Breaker, Spiral Detection

title: Create 'From Theory to Production' document
description: Bridge philosophy to production: docs/explanation/from-theory-to-production.md. Covers evolution story, three layers (Philosophy/Architecture/Implementation), constraint-first differentiation, Kelsey positioning, Houston/Fractal heritage. Links to each factor.
close_reason: Completed: Created from-theory-to-production.md document (490 lines). Bridges philosophy to production with evolution story, three-layer architecture, constraint-first methodology, Kelsey positioning, and Houston/Fractal heritage. Updated docs/README.md.

comments.author: fullerbt
comments.text:
Created docs/explanation/from-theory-to-production.md (18KB)
- Covers evolution story (individual → multi-agent → edge-to-datacenter)
- Documents three layers (Philosophy/Architecture/Implementation)
- Explains constraint-first vs capability-first differentiation
- Positions as 'Kelsey Hightower of Agents'
- Documents Houston/Fractal pattern heritage
- Links to each factor with production guidance
- Updated docs/README.md to include new document

title: Create v2.0 release
description: Update version in factors/README.md. Update CHANGELOG.md with v2.0 changes. Create git tag v2.0.0. Update main README.md with highlights. Announce release.

title: Add Implementation Patterns to Factor VIII (Human Validation)
description: Add enforcement patterns: BudgetQuota (fail-closed), 3-phase pipeline (PLAN/COMMIT/EXECUTE), Human gates between phases, Audit trail requirements. Include escalation paths.
close_reason: Added Implementation Patterns: BudgetQuota CRD, Three-Phase Pipeline, ToolCall Audit Trail, Async SSE Gates

title: Sync enhanced content to agentops-showcase
description: Copy updated factors to agentops-showcase/docs/factors/. Copy new explanation docs. Update constants if needed. Verify build succeeds. Test new section rendering (Callouts, diagrams).
close_reason: Synced 13 files (+8824/-4607 lines) with all Implementation Patterns to agentops-showcase; build verified

title: Add Implementation Patterns to Factor VI (Resume Work)
description: Add memory patterns: Explicit Memory Architecture (RAG/Graph/Historical split), Stateless Execution + External Memory, Mission lifecycle state machines (Houston), Neo4j state persistence. Include diagrams.
close_reason: Completed: Added Implementation Patterns section with 4 production patterns - Explicit Memory Architecture, Stateless Execution, Mission Lifecycle State Machines, Neo4j State Persistence

comments.author: fullerbt
comments.text:
Added Implementation Patterns section (~380 lines) with 4 production patterns from Houston/Fractal/ai-platform:
- Pattern 1: Explicit Memory Architecture (RAG/Graph/Historical three-layer model)
- Pattern 2: Stateless Execution + External Memory (agents as pure functions)
- Pattern 3: Mission Lifecycle State Machines (Houston prep→queued→held→launching→active→complete)
- Pattern 4: Neo4j State Persistence (graph memory for relationships)

title: Create Pattern Heritage document
description: Document Houston/Fractal lineage: docs/explanation/pattern-heritage.md. Houston patterns (local-first, 2024), Fractal patterns (K8s-native, 2024-2025), pattern-to-factor mapping table. Link from Implementation Patterns sections.
close_reason: Created docs/explanation/pattern-heritage.md documenting Houston and Fractal pattern lineage with factor mapping
